      Methods in physics with parameters of type Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean Physics.detectCollision(Celestial celestial, Ship ship)
      Detects collision between a celestial object and a ship by checking the distance between the edges of 2 circles.
      static void Physics.shipFlight(Ship ship, Celestial sun, Planet[] planets)
      Calculates ship momentum and coordinates while on planet and in flight.
      static void Physics.shipGuideline(Ship ship, Celestial sun, Planet[] planets)
      Calculates the ship guideline's next coordinates and momentum.
